content.en: Optimizing distribution networks: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address the challenges of optimizing the operation and management of distribution networks. These algorithms, such as the hybrid evolutionary algorithm, modified honey bee mating optimization algorithm, and artificial bee colony algorithm, are used to solve complex problems like distribution feeder reconfiguration and optimal placement of renewable energy resources. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to improve the efficiency and performance of distribution systems, considering factors like multi-objective optimization and the integration of renewable energy sources.
content.da: Optimering af distributionsnetværk: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at tackle udfordringerne ved optimering af driften og styringen af distributionsnetværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom den hybride evolutionære algoritme, modificerede honningbi-parringsoptimeringsalgoritme og kunstige biekoloni-algoritme, bruges til at løse komplekse problemer som omkonfiguration af distributionsledninger og optimal placering af vedvarende energikilder. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen i distributionssystemer ved at tage hensyn til faktorer som multiobjektiv optimering og integration af vedvarende energikilder.
